message.body: Wow, what a game, what a World Cup!
Yeah, that was too much, my heart can't take it
I think Michael Bradley has malaria or something
It was the best game I have seen... Maybe ever!
I almost fainted after the first goal by the us
I drained the beer pretty quickly after that one
We looked so good, we had so many chances! Portugals d was so good
Yeah, it is crazy. We looked so good throughout that game. That Jermaine Jones goal was so fucking good
We should have scored at least 2 more for the amount of shots we had
Yeah, as bad as a draw feels it also feels good to expect a win. We should have won because we were better than Portugal
Yes it was good to show the world who the better side was
Yeah and it was clear from watching the game who was better
Totally
Just by the Portuguese haircuts the world could see who were the biggest duche bags
Yeah they were a bunch of well groomed babies
Although I can't support the white boy dreds
I hate his hair but Beckerman was great tonight
He did get that nice elbow in
It still doesn't make up for the hair
Haha
He was just everywhere he needed to be every time winning challenges
Our defense looked sketchy to me
Howard saved their asses
Without that one horrid play by Cameron in the beginning i thought they looked pretty good. Beasley and Besler both put in good shifts
Fabian Johnson was ok on defense but he was great attacking out of the back
They kept turning over the ball in the middle of the field in front of the goal. They had a problem clearing the ball to the outside
The worst culprit was Bradley in my opinion but maybe that's just because his shit defending let them equalize in the last thirty seconds
That was terrible, I felt like they had already packed it in
But the cross was absolutely perfect
It was the first good thing Ronaldo did all day
All he needed to do was take one more step and just fucking boot it
Unfortunately
He got out paced by one of the highest paid players in the game
(1/2) As wound up as i feel when i think about this game i need to remember that if someone said we'd have four points after the first two games i would have ma
(2/2) ybe not believed it
Yeah it's crazy that our group is still up in the air
